item.title: Australian court rejects X Corp.'s appeal in child safety case, orders legal costs
item.description: An Australian appeals court has ruled against X Corp. in a legal battle with an online safety watchdog

item.title: Trump announces 25% tariff on India and unspecified penalties for buying Russian oil
item.description: President Donald Trump says the United States and India are still negotiating on trade despite new tariffs slated to begin in a few days

item.title: Chinese researchers suggest lasers and sabotage to counter Muskâ€™s Starlink satellites
item.description: Chinese scientists have been developing strategies to counter Elon Musk's Starlink satellites, which they see as a threat

item.title: Day 2 of federal investigation into fatal midair crash of Army chopper, commercial plane opens
item.description: The National Transportation Safety Board has opened public hearings on a January midair collision between an Army Black Hawk helicopter and a commerci...

item.title: Triumphant in trade talks, Trump and his tariffs still face a challenge in federal court
item.description: President Donald Trump may have gotten his way with tariffs on some countries, but his overhaul of American trade policy has not gone unchallenged
